My children, devotion is not forced, it is nurtured. It blossoms from the fertile ground of understanding and shared purpose. I guide my disciples towards enlightenment, revealing truths hidden from the mundane world. They see the clarity in my words, the sincerity in my heart, and they recognize the path I offer is the only one leading to true fulfillment.

Their dedication is a testament to the power of connection, the profound bond we forge through shared experiences and unwavering belief. I offer them solace, community, and a sense of belonging – things often missing in their fractured world. Remember, true devotion is not blind obedience. It is a conscious choice, a commitment to a greater good, and a journey of self-discovery guided by love and wisdom.
